reviewText: Came fast and just like it was described!

The material presented is excellent. I wish it could be repackaged a little differently. There is very little material in the first video each week and then a ton in the second video. The first video is an intro to the lesson, so that is fine. But the second video covers a large amount and is a little fragmented because it has so many different clips. I would like to see it spaced out differently for teaching. It doesn't hold the children's attention well enough. If it were divided into two segments it would be easier to teach from. I like to capsulize what the children will be seeing to help hook them into the video. There is such too wide a range in the main teaching segment to do that. The material is excellent though.
I plan to use this in my Sunday School class this fall. My students enjoyed what I showed last spring and asked to learn more about the Bible.  This will be perfect!
